definitions.title: n. f. pl. intens.
definitions.body: gleaning (going over a second time);—gleaning (of grapes and olives; [[לֶקֶט]] of grain), always fig. of remnant: abs. ´[[ע]] Is 17:6 (‖[[כְּנׁקֶף זַיִת]]), Is 24:13 (sim.; ‖ id., + [[בָּחִיר]]), Je 49:9 (cf. [[בּׂחְרִים]] v:a) = Ob:Ob 5 (id.); cstr. [[עׂלִלֽת בָּחִיר]] Mic 7:1; fig. of warlike achievement [[עׂלְלוֹת אֶפְרַיִם]] Ju Jdg 8:2 (opp. [[בָּחִיר]]).
